nodes.text: The Cloud City Grand Prix was an annual race held in Cloud City, Bespin. The Kel Dor pilot Bo Keevil once flew his racer, the Yellow Ace, in an edition of the Cloud City Grand Prix.

The Cloud City Grand Prix was first mentioned in the Star Wars canon with the release of Fantasy Flight Games' 2018 sourcebook Knights of Fate. The race was originally featured in the 2014 adventure module The Jewel of Yavin from the Star Wars Legends 2012 roleplaying game Star Wars: Edge of the Empire.
